text: @GovMurphy According to Stamford Uni in California the death rate of Covid-19 is between 0.14-0.16% the average flu is 0.10% -we all know it’s not the flu. But it’s looking like the lethality is close to it. Can you stop with the fear and start working on fixing the state economy. #ReOpenNJ
